package.name: Rainbow
package.shortDescription: Customizing the shades of your system.

descriptionlist.description: Take control of your system's tint color with Rainbow. By default, almost everything on iOS has the same shade of blue. Buttons, tab bars, and even iMessage bubbles have exactly the same hue as many of the other UI elements you use every day. Whether you want black message bubbles or want to change the shade of the Music app to a less harsh orange, Rainbow is for you..
